sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function capitalizeFirstLetter(string) { if (!string || typeof string !== 'string' || string.length === 0) { return ''; // Return an empty string if the string is null, not a string, or empty } return string.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + string.slice(1); } function ProfilePage({ user }) { return (

Profile

{capitalizeFirstLetter(user.name)}

{capitalizeFirstLetter(user.email)}

{capitalizeFirstLetter(user.phone)}

{capitalizeFirstLetter(user.profession)}

{/* Avoid rendering password in plain text */}

******

); } export default ProfilePage;
